```{r}

  StuID=c(1,2,3,4,5),

  )

```

```{r}
names(StuDF) 
rownames(StuDF)
StuDF[1,2]
StuDF[,2]
StuDF[1,]
StuDF[c(1,4),]
StuDF[c(1,4),c(2,3)]
StuDF[c(T,F,F,F,F),c(F,T,F)]
```


```{r}
library(readr)
student <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/course-107-1-programming-for-data-science/master/data/student.csv")
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
student %<>% mutate(
  身高級距=cut(身高,c(0,150,155,160,165,170,175,180,185,200)))
```

```{r}
which(student$身高 <= 170) -> 小個子
which(student$身高 >= 180) -> 高個子
which(student$身高 >=170 & student$身高 <= 180) -> 中等個子
```
